entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering` seems to lack an implementation #60993
  • [API Proposal]: Stable Sort for Spans #60982
  • Flaky test: Breadcrumb_thread_does_not_finish_when_app_has_unhandled_exception can fail due to output interleaving #60980
  • framework 5.0 is not installed (?? but is) #60978
  • [mono] Loader always loads from application base directory #60976
    7.0.0
  • ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationSources disposes all config providers in .NET 6 #60975
    7.0.0
  • LdapConnection fails to bind (connect to server) .NET 6 on Linux #60972
  • Devirtualization in CrossGen2 for internal virtual overrides mismatches runtime behaviour #60969
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile using keyword parameters with @ prefixes #60968
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback11 typo #60965
    7.0.0
  • Double initialization assert in JSON's property cache #60962
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\explicit\\misc\\_relexplicit1\\_relexplicit1.cmd #60952
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest197\\Generated197\\Generated197.cmd #60951
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic(type: typeof(System.ConsoleKeyInfo)) #60950
  • SslStream: Don't include "NT AUTHORITY" in Distinguished Names list of CertificateRequest. #60949
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Stable sort #15803
    Future
  • `JsonSerializer.Serialize()` ignores `MaxDepth` option #60977
  • Lists should have AddNew that only adds elements to a list if they are not already contained in the list #60991
  • Some MethodInfo(s) of array types loaded by MetadataLoadContext are incorrectly evaluated as equal. #57728
    7.0.0
  • Make OptionsManager faster by falling back to IOptionsMonitor instead of IOptionsFactory #60473
  • [API Proposal]: IWritableOptionsMonitor #60858
  • MemoryCache erroneously reports successful additions after it's been disposed #1424
    7.0.0
  • Failure in RunThreadLocalTest5_Dispose #57102
    7.0.0
  • Failure in baseservices\threading\mutex\misc\waitone2 #6372
    Future
  • Contract between GetHashCode and Equals methods broken in HashSetEqualityComparer #18931
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'op1 != nullptr' #60957
    7.0.0
  • Please add IKeyedCollection<,> as a co(ntra)variance base interface of IDictionary<,> #28744
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow take underlying array from a List<T> #58153
    Future
  • After encrypting and decrypting some part of the string is missed in .NET Core 6. #60961
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource is too slow initialized #60963
  • Overload ImmutableArray.CreateRange to accept IImmutableList<T> #27644
    Future
  • API Proposal: Adding Array.IndexOf and LastIndexOf overloads that accept a comparer. #19057
    Future
  • SslStream.TargetHostName is unavailable #57105
    Future
  • ConvertToGeneratedDllImportFixerTests.PreferredAttributeOrder failed in CI #60934

PullRequests

Created

  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
  • Fix various dump generation issues for VS4Mac #60995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add a fallback RuntimeProductVersion in runtime_version.h #60994
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Deduplicate class names in the type generator tests #60990
  • [mono][workload] Work around a msbuild bug in MatchOnMetadata #60989
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_USE_ICALL_NEWOBJ #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Mark containing type for generated stub functions as unsafe #60979
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • error C2665: 'CorSigUncompressData': none of the 3 overloads could convert all the argument types #60967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #60966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Share RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar logic in SymbolicRegexMatcher #60956
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Log more info when perf counter category is missing #60955
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter

Merged

  • Build the native prereqs in the build-jit-job.yml #60981
  • Fix Equals overload logic for some methods of an array created using MLC #60894
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Account for versioned VS in up-to-date check #60970
    community-contribution
  • Add historical note on optimizing aspects of Value Numbering #60985
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix more alloc-dealloc mismatches #60691
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Script to collect asp.net benchmark method contexts for SPMI #60953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make noise if trying to use the cache after it's been disposed. #57557
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 7.0.0
  • Fix a thread local test #60892
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Mitigate NU1103 Error showing up during Maui Builds #60946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Explicitly emit a diagnostic for ref returns in GeneratedDllImport stubs. #60720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix MD array helper intrinsics for complex `this` pointers #60958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60702
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update JsonNode doc #60925
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix `build-native.cmd` for direct use #60926
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Extract various changes from the invoke and custom marshaler PRs #60877
    arch-wasm
  • Make memory mapped stress log work for child processes. #60828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix some typos in corhdr.h #60895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][workloads] Workload 7.0.100 #60893
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't flag methods that already have GeneratedDllImport #60929
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: refactor jump threading to prepare for allowing side effects #60884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make PreferredAttributeOrder test ConditionalTheory #60940
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test bug, 7.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Setting nullable string properties from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Improve VN for (EQ/NE (RELOP ...), 0/1) #60943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Alter amount of tests that run per PR for mono mobile configurations #60727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] preparation for module encapsulation #60928
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use lower call count threshold for tiering in debug builds #60945
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • release/6.0.1: Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60887
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
